EmailTemplate.description: Deny partner applicant from regions where we aren't looking to add partners
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Application Denied - Not Expanding in Geographic Region
EmailTemplate.subject: Information Regarding your SunPower Partner Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in joining SunPower's industry leading network of dealers.
At this time SunPower is not looking to expand into the geographic markets that you have determined on your partner application form.
We would like to keep your information on file and continue the evaluation process if we decide to expand into your regional market.
Once again, we thank you for your time and interest. We look forward to speaking with you again in the near future!
Regards, {!User.FirstName}
SunPower Customer Care Team Email: customercare@sunpowercorp.com Phone: 1-800-SUNPOWER (1800-786-7693) www.sunpowercorp.com
